name: Winger Marketing
tagline: Full-Service Marketing and Public Relations Agency
description:
Let us share your story.
Winger Marketing is a full-service marketing and public relations agency working with clients across the country to grow their businesses and enhance their brands.  Winger Marketing can work as an extension of your own PR, communications or marketing team or assist with a single marketing communications challenge. Our clients and relationships span a broad range of industries including healthcare, real estate, law, travel, cultural and educational institutions, events and more. Our solutions are always strategic and integrated in a way that balances the clients' business and communications goals. We use our expertise to make sure the right people know your story.
Winger Marketing also offers custom workshops for businesses and entrepreneurs. If you are interested in training your marketing team to learn more about PR, sign them up for our PR101 course. Media training can be done for small groups or with one-on-one sessions for spokespeople and executives. And we recommend every business prepare a crisis communications protocol. Our custom workshop will help your team work through all the tough questions and help you feel prepared should you ever have a crisis with your business.
READ MORE...
